segments.text: But I'm not sleepy , Mum . Can I stay and watch more TV ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's already half past eleven . You have school tomorrow . You'll sleepy all tomorrow , if you don't sleep well tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But I promise I won't be sleepy tomorrow . I work really hard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you have the exams coming up soon ? I'm sure you could spend more time preparing for those .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I nearly forgot the exams .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You do well in maths , but your history is not good enough . Am I right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I guess so . Maybe I can go to sleep now and get up early to review the lessons tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An excellent idea . Work now and play later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know you're right . School is more important than TV . Can I watch one more show , then go to bed .
segments.speaker: S2
